original_text: In righteousness shalt thou be established: thou shalt be far from oppression; for thou shalt not fear: and from terror; for it shall not come near thee.
korean_text: 너는 공의로 설 것이며 학대가 네게서 멀어질 것인즉 네가 두려워하지 아니할 것이며 공포도 네게 가까이하지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: In righteousness shalt thou be established
thou shalt be far from oppression
for it shall not come near thee
